item.description:
Transfers represent movement of funds from one account to another. It can be intra bank (within Safe Haven) or external banks.

**Endpoints**

| Method | Url |
| --- | --- |
| `GET` | /banks-list |
| `POST` | /name-enquiry |
| `POST` | /transfer |
| `POST` | /transfer-status |
| `GET` | /transfer |

To initiate an **outward transfer** (sending funds out), you must have at least **Tier 1 verification** completed.

###  Tier 1 Requirements

At Tier 1, only minimal verification is needed. The key requirement is:

- **NIN**  National Identification Number
    

This allows you to make basic outward transfers with certain limits, depending on regulatory guidelines.
